Remote Editor¶

Creating Remote Editor¶

To start developing your remote editor, you need to become a BitBlox Developer by registering here for your free BitBlox Developer account. As a BitBlox Developer, you gain access to the Developer dashboard where you can create Remote Editor. To create a Remote Editor:

  • Log in to your Developer dashboard
  • Click Remote Editor in the sidebar.
  • Click Create a new Remote Editor.
